headline.main: Star Wars Meets Uniqlo as Fast Retailing, Disney Expand Product Tie-Up
headline.print_headline: Star Wars Meets Uniqlo as Fast Retailing, Disney Expand Product Tie-Up

docs.snippet: Fast Retailing Co Ltd's Uniqlo clothing chain said on Monday that it was expanding its collaboration with Walt Disney Co to offer a wider range of products and that it would open a flagship store at the Florida Disney World's shopping complex next...
docs.lead_paragraph: Fast Retailing Co Ltd's Uniqlo clothing chain said on Monday that it was expanding its collaboration with Walt Disney Co to offer a wider range of products and that it would open a flagship store at the Florida Disney World's shopping complex next spring.

headline.main: U.S. to Defend Syrian Rebels With Airpower, Including From Assad
headline.print_headline: U.S. to Defend Syrian Rebels With Airpower, Including From Assad

docs.snippet: The United States has decided to allow airstrikes to defend Syrian rebels trained by the U.S. military from any attackers, even if the enemies hail from forces loyal to Syrian President Bashar al-Assad, U.S. officials said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States has decided to allow airstrikes to defend Syrian rebels trained by the U.S. military from any attackers, even if the enemies hail from forces loyal to Syrian President Bashar al-Assad, U.S. officials said on Sunday.

headline.main: China’s Manufacturing Sector Shrinks Most in Two Years
headline.print_headline: China July Factory Activity Shrinks Most in Two Years-Caixin PMI

docs.snippet: The drop in a monthly survey of manufacturing activity in China was more than initially reported and is denting hopes that the economy is steadying....
docs.lead_paragraph: The drop in a monthly survey of manufacturing activity in China was more than initially reported and is denting hopes that the economy is steadying.

headline.main: Patton Kizzire Wins Web.com Tour's Utah Championship
headline.print_headline: Patton Kizzire Wins Web.com Tour's Utah Championship

docs.snippet: Patton Kizzire won the Utah Championship on Sunday for first Web.com Tour title, beating South Korea's Sung Kang with a 3-foot birdie putt on the second hole of a playoff....
docs.lead_paragraph: Patton Kizzire won the Utah Championship on Sunday for first Web.com Tour title, beating South Korea's Sung Kang with a 3-foot birdie putt on the second hole of a playoff.

headline.main: Q. and A.: Ken Liu on Science Fiction and Chinese History

docs.snippet: Mr. Liu, who was born in Gansu Province, migrated to the United States when he was 11. He discusses the literary uses of history, blending Western and Chinese traditions, and the meaning of silkpunk....
docs.abstract: Mr. Liu, who was born in Gansu Province, migrated to the United States when he was 11. He discusses the literary uses of history, blending Western and Chinese traditions, and the meaning of silkpunk.

headline.main: Jack Beckman Tops Funny Car Field at Sonoma
headline.print_headline: Jack Beckman Tops Funny Car Field at Sonoma

docs.snippet: Jack Beckman won the NHRA Sonoma Nationals on Sunday for his second straight victory and fifth of the season, beating Tommy Johnson Jr. on Sunday in the Funny Car final....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jack Beckman won the NHRA Sonoma Nationals on Sunday for his second straight victory and fifth of the season, beating Tommy Johnson Jr. on Sunday in the Funny Car final.

headline.main: U.S. Anti-Doping Chief Unaware of Americans in Damaging Report
headline.print_headline: U.S. Anti-Doping Chief Unaware of Americans in Damaging Report

docs.snippet: A "thorough and aggressive review" needs to be done to protect clean athletes from "gangsters" after a blockbuster report surfaced alleging widespread doping in athletics, the head of the U.S. Anti-Doping Agency (USADA) said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A "thorough and aggressive review" needs to be done to protect clean athletes from "gangsters" after a blockbuster report surfaced alleging widespread doping in athletics, the head of the U.S. Anti-Doping Agency (USADA) said on Sunday.
